metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6260 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA graphics driver contains a vulnerability that may allow access toapplication data processed on the GPU through a side channel exposed by theGPU performance counters. Local user access is required. This is not anetwork or remote attack vector.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-173: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
